answer:
If you were immunized at the Burnaby Health Unit, they should have a record of your immunizations. You can find the contact information for the Burnaby Health Unit here. 
You can find tips on locating immunization records here.
Immunization Nurse
question: I applied for citizenship in the US & am required to provide proof of immunization. I was immunized at the Burnaby health unit at Canada Way, would they have a copy of my record?
